meanings.sent1: The dog left a pile of shit on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: I stepped in dog shit while walking in the park.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe I have to clean up this shit again.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing garbage can smelled like rotting shit.
meanings.sent5: The toddler proudly showed off his diaper filled with shit.

meanings.sent1: Don't listen to his shit about aliens visiting Earth.
meanings.sent2: Stop talking nonsense and focus on the task at hand.
meanings.sent3: His excuse for being late was pure shit.
meanings.sent4: The conspiracy theory was a load of shit.
meanings.sent5: Her story was so full of shit, no one believed her.

meanings.definition: Something of poor quality or value
meanings.sent1: I can't believe I paid money for this cheap shit.
meanings.sent2: The knockoff purse turned out to be shit.
meanings.sent3: This product is shit; it broke after one use.
meanings.sent4: The movie was shit; I want my money back.
meanings.sent5: The shirt I bought online was shit quality.

meanings.sent1: I need to shit before we leave the house.
meanings.sent2: Excuse me, I have to go shit in the bathroom.
meanings.sent3: The urge to shit hit me suddenly during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: He ran to the toilet, desperate to shit.
meanings.sent5: After eating spicy food, he knew he would have to shit soon.

meanings.sent1: I'm so mad, I just want to shit right now.
meanings.sent2: She was so frustrated, she needed to shit out her feelings.
meanings.sent3: He tends to shit when things don't go his way.
meanings.sent4: Don't shit at me just because you're upset.
meanings.sent5: After the argument, he needed to shit to calm down.
